title: Global number of American Apparel stores by region 2010 to 2014
summary: This statistic shows the Global number American of the American Apparel from 2010 to 2014 , 2010 2014 .

In 2011 , the American Apparel 's United States 2014 made up 143 % of their Global revenue.UnileverUnilever operates in nearly 190 countries around the world and has been a traditional paragon of excellence and quality in the Fast Moving Consumer Goods sector .
The company derives its competitive advantage from its Global footprint and its track record of enhancing value for the consumers around the world .
